Products: chicken fillet (200 g), Romaine lettuce (1 bunch), white bread (2 slices), parmesan (30 g), olive oil (2 tablespoons), garlic (1 clove), salt, pepper (to taste), mayonnaise (2 tablespoons), lemon juice (1 tbsp.), mustard (1 tsp.), anchovies (2 pcs.), garlic (1 clove). Croutons: Cut bread into cubes, fry in a pan with garlic and olive oil until crisp. Chicken: Fry the chicken fillet in a frying pan until golden brown, cut into pieces. Sauce: Mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, mustard, chopped anchovies and garlic. Salad: Lay out the lettuce leaves, add the chicken, croutons, and grate the parmesan cheese on top. Serving: Fill with sauce and enjoy!
